Class: Actions

Defined in: src/modules/actions.coffee

Overview

Actions module for DOM function binding

Instance Method Summary

  • # (void) registerAction(name, action) Register Action
  • # (void) findActions() Find action in DOM
  • # (void) _fireAction(el) Subscribe actions to PubSub
  • # (void) _getActions() Expose a clone of the actions for testing
  • # (void) _getActiveElement() Expose active element for testing
